summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the construction of the East Highland Drive storm drain project in the Lake Union South - Unit 3 Sewer Separation Area, providing for the separation of existing combined sewers in East Highland Drive from Tenth Avenue East to Federal Avenue East; in East Garfield Street from Tenth Avenue East to Federal Avenue East; and in Federal Avenue East from East Garfield Street to East Galer Street, and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
